title: Sana grieves over death of UAE President Sheikh Khaifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 13 (APP): Interior Minister Rana Sana Ullah on Friday expressed deep grief and sorrow over the death of the President of the United Arab Emirates Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan.
In a condolence message, he prayed Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace.
He said Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan played exemplary role in development of UAE. Today, Pakistan deprived of a trust worthy friend and a brother, he said.
He said we equally shared the grief of UAEâ€™s royal family and the people.
